text: int main ( ) { int i = 0 , j = 0 , k , m , n = 0 , p , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & k ) ; while ( n < k ) { scanf ( "%d" , & m ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < m ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } p = m - 1 ; while ( p > 0 ) { j = 0 ; while ( j <= p - 1 ) { if ( a [ p ] [ j ] > a [ p ] [ j + 1 ] ) a [ p - 1 ] [ j ] = a [ p - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ p ] [ j ] ; else a [ p - 1 ] [ j ] = a [ p - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ p ] [ j + 1 ] ; j ++ ; } p -- ; } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; n ++ ; } return 0 ; }
